Bridging the Age-Gap in Breast Cancer seels tp improve outcomes for older women diagnosed with breast cancer.

# Outcome Measures

The primary outcome is the EORTC-QLQ-C30 generic Quality of Life questionnaire measured at 6 months post-intervention.  There are multiple secondary outcomes, which are listed along with the primary in the table below

| Questionnaire   | Description                                         | Assesed at... | Citation            |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------|---------------|---------------------|
| EORTC-QLQ-C30   | General quality of life survey for clinical trials. | 6 months      | @aaronson1993       |
| EORTC-QLQ-BR23  | Breast Cancer specific quality of life survey.      | 6 months      | @sprangers1996      |
| EORTC-QLQ-ELD15 | Older person specific quality of life survey.       | 6 months      | @johnson2010        |
| Decision Regret Scale | Assessing regret of decisions                 | 6 weeks / 6 months | @brehaut2003   |
| CollaboRATE     | Shared decision making assessment                   | Baseline      | @barr2014           |
| Spielberger State Anxiety Inventory | Assesses patienty anxsieety levels| 6 weeks / 6 months | @marteau1992 |
| Non-validated   | Assessment of knowledge, readiness to decide and treatment preference | baseline | NA     |
| Brief Illness Perceptions | Assess patients view of their illness     | 6 weeks / 6 months | @broadbent2006 |
| Brief COPE      | Coping assessment                                   | 6 weeks / 6 months | @carver1997    |
| Survival        | Survival outcomes from breast cancer                | 6 months      | @bradburn2003b      |

# Subrgoup Analysis

A number of subgroup analyses have been pre-specified, despite the reduced power such groups will have for detecting the specified minimal clinical effect, and are detailed in the table below.

| Subgroup           | Outcome                  |
|--------------------|--------------------------|
| Age 75-79          | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Age 80-84          | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Age 85-89          | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Age 90+            | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Charlson Score     | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Barthel Index      | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
| Degree of Dementia | EORTC-QLQ-C30 @ 6 months |
